1460500.name: Trainz 2019 DLC - Inzer - South Ural Mountains
1460500.description:
A beautiful replica of the railways of central Eurasia, in the Ural mountain range.

With the assistance of Google maps the relief and profile of the railway has been authentically recreated. The route includes custom made models of local stations and buildings and all other objects on the route have been carefully and appropriately selected. The textures of the earth and the grass, trees and bushes make use of the latest TRS19 technology.

The landscape, vegetation, profile of the railway track, the infrastructure of stations, cities and villages are recreated with great positional accuracy. The Kuibyshev Railway is the middle link of the Trans-Siberian Railway - the longest railway in the world. The total length of the map is more than 170km, the railway passes through the picturesque mountain places of Bashkiria. The road connected Europe with Asia, creating an important transport corridor for cargo and passengers.
1460500.supported_languages: 英语, 法语, 意大利语, 德语, 西班牙语 - 西班牙, 俄语, 捷克语, 荷兰语, 波兰语, 葡萄牙语 - 葡萄牙, 简体中文
